data.title: The Germfalcon Take Flight
data.dscription: Millions of people travel through airports around the world every single day. Since airlines are so busy and schedules are so tight, there isn’t a lot of time to clean the airplanes. That is why airplanes are breeding grounds for the flu, the common cold, and a wide range of bacteria. One inventor might have found a way to make air travel a little safer by inventing a robot that kills germs. 詳全文：The Germfalcon Take Flight
